TopicTitle: Change name of craft - Is it possible?

Articles.Content:
I have been looking for this option everywhere, and since google turns up nothing, and I doubt I'm the only one ever to want this, I fear the option IS actually in the game and that I'm too stupid to find it

So is it possible?
Right click command pod/ probe body and hit rename you can also change the craft type icon
It only works if the pod has power (and the ship has a pod or module) which can be annoying sometimes.

You tend to do this a lot or you end up with stupid names like "Mun lander launcher probe probe".

Stuff with landing cans get named lander, rover seat is rover, even if it don't have wheels or even landing legs. Probe for anything unmanned.

I knew I missing something blindingly obvious xD

Thanks guys
